meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Anna Kata Rick Doyon Hunter Appler Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7320.

div.div:
Hunter Appler game 3.
WE ASKED: Artist Lin-Manuel Miranda.

td.p: Anna Kata, a graduate student in public health from Hamilton, Ontario, Canada
Rick Doyon, a higher education administrator from Somerville, Massachusetts
Hunter Appler, an attorney originally from Mount Airy, North Carolina (whose 2-day cash winnings total $44,601)

tr.td: BASKET WEAVING
WORD ORIGINS
JAPANESE CITIES
AWARDS
HERE'S TO 50 GREAT YEARS
THAT'S MY DEPARTMENT!

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_J_2_1', 'clue_J_2_1_stuck', '(Rick: What is bistro?)
(Anna: What is café?)

saloon

RickAnna
Triple Stumper
')

...

Manhattan

HunterRick
')

toggle('clue_J_2_3', 'clue_J_2_3_stuck', '[Rick chuckles upon being ruled right.]
(Alex: Don\'t you hate it when you\'re giving a correct response, but you\'re giving it like this? [Shakes head])
[Laughter]
(Rick: I know. I\'m sorry.)
(Alex: That\'s all right.)

toast

Rick
')

div.h3: Scores at the end of the Jeopardy! Round:

tr.td: Hunter
Rick
Anna
THESPIANISTS
RELIGIOUS LANDMARKS
ITALIAN FOOD
"OO" IN THE MIDDLE, SORRY
(Alex: Each correct response will have a double "O" in exactly the center of the word.)
VICTORIAN VERSE
LADIES & GENTLEMEN... THE BEETLES!
(Alex: Notice the spelling there, though.)
